User interface.description: The Windows UI API create and use windows to display output, prompt for user input, and carry out the other tasks that support interaction with the user.

features.name: Windows Accessibility
features.description: Allows Windows developers to develop accessible Windows applications (for users with disabilities, personal preferences, or specific work styles) and automation features for testing Windows applications.

functions.name: RegisterPointerInputTarget
functions.description: Register a target window to which all pointer input of the specified type is redirected.

functions.name: RegisterPointerInputTargetEx
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

functions.name: SoundSentryProc
functions.description: Produce a customized visual signal when the SoundSentry accessibility feature is on and a Windows-based application (or an application running in a window) generates a sound through the computer's built-in speaker.

functions.name: UnregisterPointerInputTarget
functions.description: Unregister a target window to which all pointer input of the specified type is redirected.

functions.name: UnregisterPointerInputTargetEx
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

features.name: Desktop Window Manager (DWM)
features.description: Control or access many of the DWM Desktop composition features.

functions.name: DwmAttachMilContent
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

functions.name: DwmDefWindowProc
functions.description: DWM hit testing within the non-client area.

functions.name: DwmDetachMilContent
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

functions.name: Enables the blur effect on a specified window.
functions.description: Enables the blur effect on a specified window.

functions.name: DwmEnableComposition
functions.description: Enables or disables DWM composition (deprecated as of Windows 8).

functions.name: DwmEnableMMCSS
functions.description: Notifies the DWM to opt in to or out of Multimedia Class Schedule Service (MMCSS) scheduling while the calling process is alive.

functions.name: DwmExtendFrameIntoClientArea
functions.description: Extends the window frame into the client area.

functions.name: DwmFlush
functions.description: Issues a flush call that blocks the caller until the next present, when all of the Microsoft DirectX surface updates that are currently outstanding have been made. This compensates for very complex scenes or calling processes with very low priority.

functions.name: DwmGetColorizationColor
functions.description: Retrieves the current color used for DWM glass composition. This value is based on the current color scheme and can be modified by the user.

functions.name: DwmGetCompositionTimingInfo
functions.description: Retrieves the current composition timing information for a specified window.

functions.name: DwmGetGraphicsStreamClient
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

functions.name: DwmGetGraphicsStreamTransformHint
functions.description: Use a deprecated function.

functions.name: DwmGetTransportAttributes
functions.description: Retrieves transport attributes.

functions.name: DwmGetUnmetTabRequirements
functions.description: Checks the requirements needed to get tabs in the application title bar for the specified window (This function is nonfunctional for Windows 10 version 1803).

functions.name: DwmGetWindowAttribute
functions.description: Retrieves the current value of a specified attribute applied to a window.

functions.name: DwmInvalidateIconicBitmaps
functions.description: indicate that all previously provided iconic bitmaps from a window, both thumbnails and peek representations, should be refreshed.

functions.name: DwmIsCompositionEnabled
functions.description: Obtains a value that indicates whether DWM composition is enabled.

functions.name: DwmModifyPreviousDxFrameDuration
functions.description: Changes the number of monitor refreshes through which the previous frame will be displayed (no longer supported starting with Windows 8.1).

functions.name: DwmQueryThumbnailSourceSize
functions.description: Retrieves the source size of the DWM thumbnail.

functions.name: DwmRegisterThumbnail
functions.description: Creates a DWM thumbnail relationship between the destination and source windows.

functions.name: DwmRenderGesture
functions.description: Notifies DWM that a touch contact has been recognized as a gesture, and that DWM should draw feedback for that gesture.

functions.name: DwmSetDxFrameDuration
functions.description: Sets the number of monitor refreshes through which to display the presented frame (no longer supported starting with Windows 8.1).

functions.name: DwmSetIconicLivePreviewBitmap
functions.description: Sets a static, iconic bitmap to display a live preview (also known as a Peek preview) of a window or tab. The taskbar can use this bitmap to show a full-sized preview of a window or tab.

functions.name: DwmSetIconicThumbnail
functions.description: Sets a static, iconic bitmap on a window or tab to use as a thumbnail representation. The taskbar can use this bitmap as a thumbnail switch target for the window or tab.

functions.name: DwmSetPresentParameters
functions.description: Sets the present parameters for frame composition. it starting with Windows 8.1.

functions.name: DwmSetWindowAttribute
functions.description: Sets the value of non-client rendering attributes for a window.

functions.name: DwmShowContact
functions.description: Specify the visual feedback type to draw in response to a particular touch or pen contact.

functions.name: DwmTetherContact
functions.description: Enables the graphical feedback of touch and drag interactions to the user.

functions.name: DwmTransitionOwnedWindow
functions.description: Coordinates the animations of tool windows with the DWM.

functions.name: DwmUnregisterThumbnail
functions.description: Removes a DWM thumbnail relationship created by the DwmRegisterThumbnail function.

functions.name: DwmUpdateThumbnailProperties
functions.description: Updates the properties for a DWM thumbnail.
